name: X: The Master of Illusion
description:
You have to evade or shoot down the objects coming toward you!

You have 2 kinds of spells that you can use: A fireball that immediatly burns the target, but you can only shoot it once per second, or an ice spell that slows the target down, but doesn't deal damage.

CONTROLS:

moving the mouse, left and right click

Not recommended on mobile!

With the help of, and based on the idea of https://pettywise1101.itch.io/
